overview: At the end of the Qing Dynasty and the beginning of the Republic of China, domestic warlords supported and supported their troops and independent forces. Among the numerous forces, Lei Hong, the Guangdong warlord, is the most shameless. He colludes with foreign forces and betrays Chinese intelligence. All domestic righteous people want to kill them quickly. Guo Tian, President of Shanghai Jingwu Association, sent the imperial court to Guangdong to assassinate Lei Hong, but he failed. In the assassination, the court met Xiuhui (Lei Hong's concubine) and fell in love. The Japanese Imperial Army representative Ichiro Yamamoto arrived and met Lei Hongquan's family. But Yamamoto came to China to take over all of Lei Hong's affairs, even his wife and concubine. Lei Hong learned that he was furious and designed to kill with a knife. In Xiuhui's funeral, Lei Hong invited Guo Tian and others to attend, trying to catch them all. Who is the final winner?
title: Times of Warlords
